item.description:
11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation by Maureen Campaiola, The Debt Free, Stress Free Holiday Shopping Guide

Halloween hasn’t even happened yet but some stores are already displaying Christmas decorations.  I don’t know about you, but the Christmas Seasons seems to start earlier and earlier each year. And, with the early arrival usually comes the pressure to begin thinking about gift giving.

Think about this:  Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Years are three major holidays that occur within a 32 day span of each other. 

You may be thinking, “the leaves have barely began to turn color so why think about holiday gift giving and holiday expenses?”  I will tell you from experience; it really is smarter to start earlier than to wait for the last minute holiday rush.  By planning now, you can take advantage of deals that will save you tons of money in the long run.  Additionally, the more you plan the less stress you will have; it’s as simple as that! 

By applying these tips you will save money, be better prepared and have a holiday season that’s just about stress free.  

About Maureen

Maureen Campaiola, is CEO of Breakthrough Your Money BS.  A recovering over-spender, over-charger, and someone tittering on the brink of bankruptcy, Maureen faced her money fears head on busting through her money drama and now enjoys the freedom that only true money recovery can bring. She changed her money story and she's her to help you change yours! 

 

1:15  - 1:30 - Networking and Wrap up

 

There will be a table available for business cards and promotional materials.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
